title: Sophisticated Haven In A Premium Lifestyle Enclave -2654 Villa Cortona
posting_body: Capture The Charm, Love The Space, Live The Location
Beautiful, spacious, and modern end-unit townhouse conveniently nestled in South San Jose.
Easy access to freeway 87, multicultural restaurants, and bus stop.

This home is built with a large living room with a fireplace, an up-to-date kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 3  balconies, a separate garage, a nice backyard with artificial turf, and a rose garden with a seating area which make this home very attractive.
Other amenities include central air-conditioning and heating, and an in-unit washer and dryer.
All pets are fine, too!
This unique home won't last long.
Schedule your private tour today..
